# tastyR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tastyR is to provide recipe data from Allrecipes.com for easy access and analysis.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tastyR like so:


```{r}
devtools::install_github("owlzyseyes/tastyR")
```
